DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate pain control continuous adductor canal block place proximally versus distally within canal . The investigator hypothesize similar pain control group .
DOC.brief_title: Proximal Versus Distal Adductor Canal Blocks Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.detailed_description: This study non-inferiority trial design determine whether placement continuous block within adductor canal substantial impact pain follow total knee arthroplasty . Our primary outcome determine difference opioid consumption within first day follow surgery . Secondary outcome include : pain score , quadriceps strength , distance ambulate physical therapy .
DOC.criteria: Unilateral Total Knee Arthroplasty ASA physical status IIII > 18 year old Nonpregnant Consent participate study Refusal participate < 18 year old Chronic opioid use Localized infection Pregnancy Preexisting coagulopathy Allergy ultrasound gel local anesthetic Contraindication refusal spinal anesthetic
